name: Duck Hunting 3d Season 2018
description:
Check our new game for Duck Hunting Season Free available on Appstore!

The Hunting Season is started so get ready to shoot some ducks! in Duck Hunting Season you are a duck hunter. So do you think you are a good player? Show us how good you are and shoot every duck you see. Or will the ducks laugh at you because you can’t shoot them.

The hunting fever is at the high so grab the hunting gun and go for a duck hunt. Get ready for Duck Hunting Season! Shoot ducks as much you can with 3D Gun in a beautiful environment, mix up of beautiful jungle birds and duck sounds. Feel like in realistic duck hunting environment. If you are a good shooter and can accept the challenge, then here is the perfect situation for you.

Duck Hunting Season has a great gameplay and will give you the feeling that you are a real hunter. So grab your shot gun put on your Hunting Outfit and go into the field and shoot some ducks. This game is all about precision, aiming and timing. Don’t forget to pull the trigger otherwise you’ll will never shoot the ducks.

In Duck Hunting Season you will shoot the ducks with a shot gun which has a great handling. you steer and shoot the ducks by using only 3 buttons nothing more.

If you like shooting games you definitely should play this game and you will enjoy it for a long time, so you don’t have to stop hunting duck.

Duck Hunting Real Season Game Features:
- First person 3D Shooting
- Efficient Weapon control
- 3D Graphics and Sound Effects
- Real time Duck Hunting with animations
- Multiple waves
-A lot of ducks
-Unique game-play
-Must play game
More features and location will be released in the next version of the game.
